secret_rule: Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both part of the same famous duo or partnership in popular culture, with one being the name of one half of the duo and the other being the name of the other half.

conversation.content:

Lennon" and "McCartney".

Based on the examples provided and the successful pairs that have been confirmed, it seems that the secret rule may involve pairs of well-known duos, whether they are fictional characters, musical artists, or famous entities that commonly appear together.

I would like to make a guess. Can I bring "Romeo" and "Juliet"?

Correct! The rule is Pairs of items can be brought to the picnic if they are both part of the same famous duo or partnership in popular culture, with one being the name of one half of the duo and the other being the name of the other half.
